tests.name: append-1.1
tests.script:
# Test: append adds to variable
# Concatenates values to existing variable

set str "hello"
append str " world"
puts $str
append str "!" "!"
puts $str

tests.name: append-1.2
tests.script:
# Test: append creates variable if needed
# Variable is created with appended value

append newvar "first"
puts $newvar
append newvar " second"
puts $newvar

tests.name: array-1.1
tests.script:
# Test: array set and get
# Arrays use parentheses for keys

set data(name) "Alice"
set data(age) 30
puts $data(name)
puts $data(age)

tests.name: array-1.2
tests.script:
# Test: array exists and names
# Check if array exists, list keys

set arr(a) 1
set arr(b) 2
set arr(c) 3
puts [array exists arr]
puts [lsort [array names arr]]

tests.name: array-1.3
tests.script:
# Test: array size
# Returns number of elements

set items(one) 1
set items(two) 2
set items(three) 3
puts [array size items]

tests.name: incr-1.1
tests.script:
# Test: incr increments integer variable
# Default increment is 1

set count 0
incr count
puts $count
incr count
puts $count

tests.name: incr-1.2
tests.script:
# Test: incr with explicit increment
# Can increment by any integer

set n 10
incr n 5
puts $n
incr n -3
puts $n

tests.name: info-1.1
tests.script:
# Test: info exists checks variable existence
# Returns 1 if exists, 0 if not

puts [info exists undefined]
set defined value
puts [info exists defined]

tests.name: set-1.1
tests.script:
# Test: basic set and get
# Set creates variable, returns value

set x hello
puts $x
set y [set x]
puts $y

tests.name: set-1.2
tests.script:
# Test: set with no value returns current value
# Reading a variable with set

set myvar "test value"
puts [set myvar]

tests.name: unset-1.1
tests.script:
# Test: unset removes variable
# Variable no longer exists after unset

set x hello
puts $x
unset x
puts [info exists x]

tests.name: unset-1.2
tests.script:
# Test: unset multiple variables
# Can unset several variables at once

set a 1
set b 2
set c 3
unset a b
puts [info exists a]
puts [info exists b]
puts [info exists c]
